channel.title: Comments on: Support for Windows XP is Ending Soon
channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: By: James asks, "What if I don't want Windows 8?" - Deemable Tech | Deemable Tech
item.dc:creator: James asks, "What if I don't want Windows 8?" - Deemable Tech | Deemable Tech
item.description: […] We’ve been talking about this a lot lately because Microsoft officially stopped supporting Windows XP on April 8, 2014. This means that, while you can continue using XP on your computer, Microsoft will no longer be […]

item.title: By: Windows XP is dead. It's time to move on. | Bold City IT

item.description: […] you haven’t heard already, Microsoft ended support for Windows XP on April 8th, 2014. That means that Microsoft is no longer making any bug fixes, updates or security patches for your […]
